**Summary**
• Rivian cuts workforce for the second time this year, ahead of R2 SUV launch.
• Previous cut in June hit manufacturing with 140 jobs lost.
• Company’s focusing on efficiency as it gears up for new models.

Impact — Rivian’s trimming the fat to stay lean and mean for its next big launch.
